query: "What diagnosis or problem was addressed during my most recent medical encounter on 09-30-2022?"
resource_summaries: This record is about an encounter at South Shore Hospital for a patient named Mr. Gonzalo Alejandro Dueñas, involving a primary performer, Dr. January Roberts, for the reason of a malignant neoplasm of the breast.
answer: Your most recent medical encounter was at South Shore Hospital on September 30, 2022, for a patient named Mr. Gonzalo Alejandro Dueñas. The primary performer was Dr. January Roberts, and the reason was a malignant neoplasm of the breast.
